titleStmt.title: The manner of procession to the Parliament-house in Scotland with His Majesties letter to the Parliament, the lord high commissioners speech, the lord high chancellors speech, and the Parliaments answer.
titleStmt.author: James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Re-printed for Andrew Crook, and Samuel Helsham and are to be sold by Samuel Helsham ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
